Pre-Game Insights: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson, and Shivam Dube are back in the squad, potentially shaking up the batting order.
Samson might take over the wicketkeeping duties from Dhruv Jurel, while Jaiswal could partner skipper Gill at the top.
This could push Abhishek down to number 3, a position where he thrived with two rapid fifties during the IPL.
Ruturaj Gaikwad, despite his unbeaten 77 in the previous match, might make way for Jaiswal to accommodate the returning players.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Harare proves favourable for batting, as evidenced in the second T20 match between India and Zimbabwe.
Similar conditions expected for upcoming matches.
